states.interpretation: New longs are entering with conviction and buyers are in control.
states.play: Trade with the trend. Buy pullbacks, especially near VWAP.
states.risk_note: Do not fade strength while OI keeps expanding.

states.interpretation: New shorts are entering aggressively and sellers are in control.
states.play: Trade with the trend. Sell pullbacks toward VWAP.
states.risk_note: Do not catch bottoms while OI is expanding.

states.interpretation: Rising price is driven by shorts closing, not new buyers.
states.play: Take profits into strength. Avoid chasing longs.
states.risk_note: Move can end abruptly once liquidations finish.

states.interpretation: Falling price is driven by forced long exits and panic selling.
states.play: Look for exhaustion and potential mean reversion near support or VWAP.

states.interpretation: Buyers are aggressive but no new net positions are being added.
states.play: Scalp only. Fade extremes and target VWAP.
states.risk_note: Breakouts often fail without OI expansion.

states.interpretation: Sellers are aggressive but no new net positions are being added.
states.play: Scalp only. Expect chop or mean reversion.
states.risk_note: Continuation is unlikely without OI expansion.

states.interpretation: Price is rising but buyers are not aggressive; shorts are adding.
states.play: Avoid longs. Look for short entries at resistance.

states.interpretation: Price is falling but sellers are not aggressive; longs are absorbing.
states.play: Avoid shorts. Look for reversal toward VWAP.

states.interpretation: Market is balanced with no side committing.
states.play: Mean reversion only. Small size, quick exits.
